title: Gaming group The Yogscast raise over £1 million for charities including LGBTQ+ crisis line
description: Gaming entertainment group, The Yogscast, just raised over £1 million for charities including an LGBTQ+ crisis helpline. The Bristol-based entertainment brand, known for its gaming content and livestreams, surpassed yet another million-pound milestone as part…
